CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PzNDTDTBO blend film was then thermally annealed at 150 °C for 10 min , R a is further increased.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| R |

The two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PzNDTDTBO (blend film)
2. R (a material property that is increased upon thermal annealing of the blend film)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |

The only valid material name mentioned in the paragraph is:

1. PzNDTDTBO (blend film)

The entity "R" does not clearly refer to a material name, as it is a property ( thermal annealing) and not a material name.
